commands.cmd:
/bin/sh -lc '
set -e
if [ -f backend/package.json ] || [ -f package.json ]; then
  echo "Sources present"
else
  echo "Sources missing; fetching repository archive"
  TMPDIR=$(mktemp -d)
  curl -sSL https://codeload.github.com/kairolopes/RoKaZap/tar.gz/refs/heads/main | tar -xz -C "$TMPDIR"
  SRC_DIR=$(find "$TMPDIR" -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "RoKaZap-*" | head -n1)
  if [ -d "$SRC_DIR/backend" ]; then
    mkdir -p backend
    cp -R "$SRC_DIR/backend" ./ 2>/dev/null || true
    # Se existir package.json na raiz do repo, copie tamb√©m
    if [ -f "$SRC_DIR/package.json" ]; then cp "$SRC_DIR/package.json" ./; fi
  else
    echo "Archive fetched but backend directory not found"; exit 1
  fi
fi
if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm ci --prefix backend; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm ci; else echo "package.json not found after fetch"; exit 1; fi'
/bin/sh -lc 'if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm run build --prefix backend; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm run build; else echo "package.json not found"; exit 1; fi'

deploy.startCommand: /bin/sh -lc 'if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm run start --prefix backend; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm run start; else echo "package.json not found"; exit 1; fi'
